ygData.subject: Re: What happens to the molds?
ygData.msgSnippet: Just like in days of old on a planet called Earth, they used earthen (Sand & dirt) molds to pour their metals to fashion items.  These had to be destroyed in
ygData.messageBody:
Just like in days of old on a planet called Earth, they used earthen (Sand &
dirt) molds to pour their metals to fashion items. These had to be
destroyed in order to get the items out properly, so they made PATERNS for
the molds... Too bad we can't buy patterns for them.. hehe...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com



> > From: "Frank Hartmann" <FRANHART@...>
> >
> > OK, so I'm ready to start making items requiring molds. In Oggok, the
only
> > molds which are available are lantern molds and sewing kit molds. I
> > believe lanterns are easier to make so I'll be starting on those. My
> > question is what happens to the molds upon success or failure. Will my
> > mold be destroyed on success? On failure? Is it random?
> >
> > Kludge
> > Ogre Shaman
> > Rallos Zek
